title: Static Men's Clothing Website with Founder & Contact Information

requirements.text: Create a single-page static website for a men’s clothing business that clearly displays: (1) site title “Men’s Clothing Store”, (2) founder line “Founder: Yash Jaiswal”, (3) main contact number “9919031636”, and (4) ordering instruction “Order Now: 9919031626”. All user-facing text must be in English.

quotes: Create my website for men cloths create a static website and add my mobile number 9919031636 and add my information about yash jaiswal is founder of this company and add order to contact this number 9919031626

Title: Men’s Clothing Store
Founder: Yash Jaiswal
Contact: 9919031636
Order Now: 9919031626

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders the title exactly as “Men’s Clothing Store”.
Founder information is displayed exactly as “Founder: Yash Jaiswal”.
Main contact number is displayed exactly as “9919031636”.
Order contact instruction is displayed exactly as “Order Now: 9919031626”.
No backend calls are required to view the page content.

requirements.text: Make both phone numbers clickable using tel: links, and label them clearly so users can distinguish general contact vs ordering.

quotes: add order to contact this number 9919031626

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping the main contact number opens the device dialer via a tel: link.
Clicking/tapping the order number opens the device dialer via a tel: link.
Labels/text make it clear which number is for general contact and which is for ordering.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, modern fashion-forward visual theme (not blue/purple) across the page: consistent typography, spacing, and component styling (hero/header, content sections, and contact/order callouts).

quotes: Create my website for men cloths create a static website

acceptanceCriteria: The page uses a consistent color palette and typography appropriate for a men’s fashion storefront (avoid blue/purple as dominant theme colors).
Layout is responsive and looks good on mobile and desktop.
Contact/order callouts are visually emphasized (e.g., cards or highlighted sections) without adding new product features.

requirements.text: Add generated static images as assets and render them on the landing page: a simple brand logo and a wide hero/banner image that fits the chosen theme. Store images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend.

quotes: Create my website for men cloths create a static website

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are loaded directly by the React app (no backend/image API).
The logo image is displayed in the header/brand area.
The hero/banner image is displayed prominently near the top of the page.
Images render correctly in production build and on mobile/desktop.

constraints: Frontend must use the existing React + TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui component composition approach; do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not add third-party authentication or external services; this is a static informational site.
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: E-commerce checkout, cart, payments, or inventory management.

required: High-contrast men’s fashion hero banner with clean studio backdrop (mens-clothing-hero.dim_1600x800.png)
